text: Nikuti wape ilagasyo achinakunaku wachilume ni wachikongwe, kwisa soni wakuwanganya (Allah ni isanamu) wachilume ni wachikongwe, waakunâ€™ganichisyaga Allah nganisyo syangalumbana, pa wanganyao pana mpupulusi wakusakala, soni Allah wakasilichile, walwesile, ni walinganyichisye Jahannama, kaje kusakala malo gakuwujila gakwe
